hotel_options.name: The Oberoi Udaivilas, Udaipur
hotel_options.address: Haridas Ji Ki Magri, Udaipur, Rajasthan 313001
hotel_options.descriptions: A luxurious palace hotel on the banks of Lake Pichola, offering stunning views, opulent rooms, and exceptional service.

hotel_options.name: Rambagh Palace, Jaipur
hotel_options.descriptions: A former royal residence transformed into a luxurious hotel, featuring grand architecture, manicured gardens, and impeccable service.

hotel_options.name: The Leela Palace, New Delhi
hotel_options.descriptions: A luxurious hotel in the heart of New Delhi, offering spacious rooms, elegant dining options, and a world-class spa.

hotel_options.name: The Taj Lake Palace, Udaipur
hotel_options.descriptions: A majestic palace hotel located on an island in Lake Pichola, offering breathtaking views, luxurious accommodations, and a royal experience.

day1.name: Arrival in Jaipur & Rambagh Palace
day1.details: Arrive at Jaipur Airport and check in to the luxurious Rambagh Palace. Relax and enjoy the opulence of the former royal residence.

day2.name: Jaipur Sightseeing: Amber Fort, Hawa Mahal & City Palace
day2.details: Explore the majestic Amber Fort, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, and experience an elephant ride to the top. Visit the Hawa Mahal (Palace of Winds) and the City Palace, showcasing the grandeur of Jaipur's royal history.
day2.ticketPricing: Amber Fort: INR 50, Hawa Mahal: INR 50, City Palace: INR 200

day3.name: Jodhpur: Mehrangarh Fort & Umaid Bhawan Palace
day3.details: Fly to Jodhpur and check in to a luxurious hotel. Explore the imposing Mehrangarh Fort, offering panoramic city views. Visit the opulent Umaid Bhawan Palace, now a part hotel and part museum.
day3.ticketPricing: Mehrangarh Fort: INR 600, Umaid Bhawan Palace: INR 600

day4.name: Jaisalmer: Desert Safari & Patwon Ki Haveli
day4.details: Travel to Jaisalmer, the Golden City, and check in to a luxury desert resort. Embark on a camel safari in the Thar Desert, experiencing the beauty of the sand dunes. Visit Patwon Ki Haveli, a grand mansion with intricate carvings and stunning architecture.
day4.ticketPricing: Desert Safari: INR 2000-3000, Patwon Ki Haveli: INR 100

day5.name: Udaipur: Lake Pichola & City Palace
day5.details: Fly to Udaipur, the City of Lakes, and check in to the opulent Oberoi Udaivilas. Enjoy a boat ride on Lake Pichola, offering breathtaking views of the city and its palaces. Visit the City Palace, a magnificent complex with intricate architecture and stunning artwork.
day5.ticketPricing: Boat ride: INR 500-1000, City Palace: INR 250

day6.name: Udaipur: Saheliyon Ki Bari & Jag Mandir
day6.details: Visit Saheliyon Ki Bari (Garden of the Maidens), a beautiful garden designed for the royal ladies. Enjoy a sunset cruise on Lake Pichola with views of Jag Mandir, a palace island.
day6.ticketPricing: Saheliyon Ki Bari: INR 20, Jag Mandir: INR 100

day7.name: Departure from Udaipur
day7.details: Enjoy a leisurely breakfast at the Oberoi Udaivilas before departing from Udaipur Airport.
